item.title: When To See Mars As A ‘Cherry’ On The Moon This Weekend In Rare Event
item.description: Skywatchers can catch a rare conjunction of the moon and Mars on June 29, appearing as a reddish "cherry" near a crescent moon after sunset.

item.title: Mira Murati’s Startup Might Rival OpenAI, Anthropic

item.title: Patient Survival Jumps If In-Hospital MD Aced Assessment Test: Study

item.title: ‘F1’ Arrives With A Stunning Rotten Tomatoes Audience Score
item.description: F1 is arriving in theaters and it has amassed an audience score that's on part with what we saw with Top Gun: Maverick.

item.title: Once Left For Dead, Minivan Sales Are On The Upswing
item.description: Minivans remain the ideal family-minded rides. Here’s what the current fleet has to offer.
